Turn card reader on and place it next to mobile device

Refund declined due to insufficient funds

Refund was declined for an unknown reason
You have at least one overdue requirement on your account. Please take care of that to resume In-Person Payments.
There are pending requirements in your account. Please complete those requirements by %1$s to keep accepting In-Person Payments.
We are sorry but we can\’t support In-Person Payments for this store.
You\’ll be able to accept In-Person Payments as soon as we finish reviewing your account.

In-Person Payments will only work with one of following plugins activated. Please contact a site administrator to deactivate one of these plugins to continue:

You can still accept In-Person Cash Payments by enabling the \"cash on delivery\" payment method on your store

In-Person Payments isn\’t available in Test Mode. Please turn it off to continue.
The WooCommerce Payments extension is installed on your store but not activated. Please activate it to accept In-Person Payments.
You\’ll need to install the free WooCommerce Payments extension on your store to accept In-Person Payments.
Finish setup WooCommerce Payments in your store admin
You’re almost there! Please finish setting up WooCommerce Payments to start accepting In-Person Payments.

Your reader takes about three hours to fully charge
To collect payments, simply swipe, tap or insert card on reader
Congrats, you are now able to accept debit and credit card payments!

resources.string: Access discounted shipping rates. Currently available with DHL and USPS, with more to come soon!
No need to wonder where that stampbook went.
Buy postage when you need it
Pick up an order, then just pay, print, package, and post.
Fulfill your orders with WooCommerce Shipping
Check that the site URL entered is valid
Get the full experience with Jetpack
New analytics views, let you see visitors, reports and more.
Get push notifications for new orders, reviews, etc. delivered to your device.
Install the free Jetpack plugin to experience the best mobile experience.
Get the most out of your store
Allow multiple users to access WooCommerce Mobile.
Alternatively, you can %s Jetpack in WP Admin.
Please wait while we connect %s with Jetpack.
Install the free Jetpack plugin to %s to experience the best mobile experience.

This is a dev extension for %1$s (%2$s), automatically added by the LeakCanary library.

LeakCanary is a memory leak detection library for Android, created and open sourced by Pierre-Yves Ricau at Square.

You can learn more about memory leaks at https://squ.re/leaks.

We welcome contributions from the community - please do not hesitate to report an issue or open a pull request!
Found %1$d retained objects grouped as %2$d distinct leaks (%3$d new)
Are you sure you want to delete all leaks?
Rendering HQ Bitmap, this may take a while…
Rendering HQ Bitmap, this may take a while…
heap dumping disabled from LeakCanary About screen
test class "%s" was found in classpath
LeakCanary is running and ready to detect memory leaks.
Could not import %s, this is not an hprof file.
All retained objects were garbage collected
Last heap dump was less than a minute ago
%d retained objects, tap to dump heap
App visible, waiting until %d retained objects
Please grant the External Storage Permission first, see notification…
Please grant external storage permission, otherwise memory leaks will not be detected.
Click to enable storage permission for %s.
LeakCanary is dumping memory to investigate leaks.
Heap Analysis failed, see details in Logcat
Heap Analysis performed: %1$d application leaks, %2$d library leaks. See details in Logcat
%1$d retained objects. Heap dump threshold is %2$d.\nBackground the app to trigger heap dump immediately
Open link in a new window/tab
We were unable to access your site. You will need to reach out to your host to resolve this.
We were unable to access your site because it requires HTTP Authentication. You will need to reach out to your host to resolve this.
Here are a few other things you can try:
We were unable to access your site because of a problem with the SSL Certificate. You will need to reach out to your host to resolve this.
We were unable to access the XMLRPC file on your site. You will need to reach out to your host to resolve this.
Can\'t detect your email client app

What email do I use to sign in?
There\'s no WordPress.com account matching this Google account.
There was some trouble connecting with the Google account.
Google login could not be started.
We\'ve made too many attempts to send an SMS verification code — take a break, and request a new one in a minute.
Error while adding site. Error code: %s
There was a problem communicating with the site. An HTTP error code 401 was returned.
Unable to read the WordPress site at that URL. Tap on help icon to view the FAQ.
XML-RPC calls seem blocked on this site (error code 401). If attempt to login fails tap on help icon to view the FAQ.
XML-RPC services are disabled on this site.
Get a login link by email
Please enter a complete website address, like example.com.
Jetpack not found. Please try again
This app requires Jetpack to connect to your store.
To use this app for %1$s you\'ll need to have the Jetpack plugin connected on your store.
Learn how to install and connect Jetpack
Jetpack is a free WordPress plugin that connects your store with the tools needed to give you the best mobile experience, including push notifications and stats
Log in to WordPress.com to access the post.
Log in to WordPress.com to share the content.
We\'ll email you a link that\'ll log you in instantly, no password needed.
Check your email on this device and tap the link in the email you received from WordPress.com.
Need help finding the email you connected with?
Need help finding the connected email?
To use this app for %1$s you\'ll need to have the Jetpack plugin setup and connected to a WordPress.com account
We didn\'t find WooCommerce stores connected to this account. You\'ll need to install and connect the free Jetpack plugin on your WooCommerce stores to use this app.
It looks like %1$s isn\'t associated with a WordPress.com account.
To use this app for %1$s you\'ll need to have the Jetpack plugin setup and connected to this account. \n\nOnce setup, refresh the app
It looks like %1$s is connected to a different WordPress.com account.
It looks like %1$s is not a WooCommerce site. Install the WooCommerce plugin on your site and then refresh the app.
We were not able to detect a WordPress site at the address you entered. Please make sure WordPress is installed and that you are running the latest available version.
Track sales and high perfoming products
Manage your store orders on the go
Edit and add new products from anywhere
Monitor and approve your product reviews
Catch up with your favorite sites and join the conversation anywhere, any time.
Manage your Jetpack-powered site on the go — you\'ve got WordPress in your pocket.
Your notifications travel with you — see comments and likes as they happen.
Publish from the park. Blog from the bus. Comment from the café. WordPress goes where you go.
Watch readers from around the world read and interact with your site — in realtime.
Need help finding your site address?
Your site address appears in the bar at the top of the screen when you visit your site in Chrome.
Almost there! We just need to verify your Jetpack connected email address %1$s
Log in to the WordPress.com account you used to connect Jetpack.
This store uses an older version of WooCommerce. Please upgrade your store to WooCommerce 3.5 or greater to use it with this app.
There was some trouble fetching your account. You can retry now or close and try again later.
Didn\'t mean to create a new account? Go back to re-enter your email address.
Not seeing the email? Check your Spam or Junk Mail folder.
Currently unavailable. Please enter your password
An error has occurred. Please login to continue

resources.string: Make sure you are running the latest version of WooCommerce on your site and that you have WooCommerce Admin activated.\n\nStill need help? %1$s
We can\'t display your\n store\'s analytics
We\'ve rolled out improvements to our analytics. Upgrade to WooCommerce 4.0 or above or install WooCommerce Admin plugin to keep seeing your stats after September 1, 2020.
Upgrade to keep seeing your stats
The site at this address is not a WordPress site. For us to connect to it, the site must use WordPress.
Please provide an authentication code to continue.
Please double check your password to continue.
Please log in with your username and password.
Your network is unavailable. Check your data or wifi connection.
Change the product quantity from %d to %d
Unable to update address with empty email. Make sure you are running the latest version of WooCommerce.
If you’ve enabled this setting, the customer will receive a confirmation email once the order is completed
Something went wrong with the refund. Please try again.
Your refund for %s is being processed. Please wait…
Are you sure you want to issue a refund? This can’t be undone.
The refund is higher than the available amount
The payment method does not support automatic refunds. Complete the refund by transferring the money to the customer manually.
The refund must be greater than 0
By refunding an amount, no items will be restocked
Are you sure you want to discard this tracking?
Tracking number copied to the clipboard
Learn more about printing receipts with your device
Create shipping labels from your device!!
You can now create shipping labels for all physical orders directly from your device with the free WooCommerce Shipping plugin. Tap on "Create shipping label" to try our beta feature!
Learn more about creating labels with your mobile device

We are working on making it easier for you to print shipping labels directly from you device! For now, if you have created shipping labels for this order in your store admin with WooCommerce Shipping, you can print them in your Order Details here.
Print shipping labels from your device!
This order is using extensions to calculate shipping. The shipping methods shown might be incomplete.
If renaming an add-on in your web dashboard, please note that previous orders will no longer show that add-on within the app.
Sorry, we couldn\'t load the Order Add-ons right now

We are working on making it easier for you to see product add-ons from your device! For now, you’ll be able to see the add-ons for your orders. You can create and edit these add-ons in your web dashboard.
Create an order with minimal information
We\'ve been working on making it possible to create orders and take payments from your device! You can try these features out by tapping on the "+" button
We\'re sorry, we couldn\'t find any orders
It looks like this password is incorrect. Please double check your information and try again.

It looks like you turned off permissions required for this feature.

To change this, edit your permissions and make sure %s is enabled.
We need permission to access your images
Make sure the Print Service Plugin for yor printer is installed.
Enable bluetooth or Wifi connection on your printer.
When selecting "Print receipt" after accepting payment, replace "Save as PDF" with "All printers", and search for new printer.
Pair and connect the printer to your mobile when prompted.
Adjust paper size as needed, and select "Print" when ready to print the receipt.
If printing is not available, you can always save your receipt as PDF and send it by email to print it from another device.
If you are experiencing issues printing from your device, contact customer support for your printer.
Make sure your printer and your device are connected to the same WiFi networks
After selecting \"Print shipping label\", you may have to select and add a printer if you haven\'t printed from this device before.
You can select your device\'s default print service or install your printer\'s brand app (this should appear as a recommended option)
You might have to configure WiFi printing directly on the printer itself. Make sure the printer firmware is updated and see your printer documentation for instructions.
If you are still experiencing issues printing from your device, you can save your label as PDF and send it by email to print it from another device.
You can edit product add-ons in the web dashboard.
An attribute with this name already exists
Now that you\'ve added attributes, you can create your first variation!
Do you want to move this product to the Trash?
To create a variation, you\'ll need to set its attributes (ie \"Color\", \"Size\") first
Describe your product to your future customers…
Image uploading will continue in the background
This product has no variations yet
Are you sure you want to remove this file?
Enter the number of days before a download limk expires, or leave blank if never it expires
Enter the number of time file can be downloaded or leave blank for unlimited downloads
This is the name of the file shown to the customer
This is the URL of the file which customers will get access to. URLs entered should already be encoded.
Check that the url entered is valid
Add each option name and press enter
This text will be shown on the button linking to the external product
Enter the external URL to the product
Are you sure you want to remove this image?
Please wait for the current operation to complete
Drag and drop to re-order photos
Only one photo can be displayed per product variation
How many items are in stock
SKU already in use by another product
We\'ve added editing functionality to simple products. Keep an eye out for more options soon!
Determines the product\'s positioning in the catalog. The lower the value of the number, the higher the item will be on the product list. You can also use negative numbers.
You must set the sale price if a sale is scheduled
Sale price must be less than regular price
An optional note to send the customer after purchase
Type of variation, eg. size or color
Automatically start and end a sale
Or tap to select an existing attribute
Or tap to select an existing option
Helps to easily identify this product
This is the URL-friendly version of the product title
An option with this name already exists
Changing the product type will modify some of the product data
Are you sure you want to change the product type?
Link a product to an external website
A unique physical product that you may have to ship to the customer
A product with variations like color or size
A unique digital product like services, downloadable books, music or videos
All files currently attached to this product will be removed.
Are you sure you want to remove the ability to download files when product is purchased?
%1$d images have been added to the product %2$s
Adding options like size and color is currently available only on the web. These will show up as options on the product page of your site.
This setting determines which shop pages products will be listed on
We\'ve added more editing functionalities to products! You can now update images, see previews and share your products.
